Name: GLOCK 40 12.7x55 Pistol
Description: Glock 40 is an Austrian pistol designed by Glock company for the Austrian army purposes. Thanks to both to its impressive combat characteristics and reliablity gained wide recognition and popularity also as a police, shooting sports and civilian self-defence weapon. Gun Goes Boom, Boooom, and BBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR
